title: Video: Clu – Evening Ever
body:
I was recommended **Clu** by Irish beatmaking poster boy **Mmoths** whilst at **The Great Escape** festival in Brighton, and needless to say, I checked them out almost as soon as I returned.

Their new video for the **Burial**\-inspired _Evening Ever_ is a wonderfully youthful affair, following two lads as they explore what appears to be an abandoned leisure complex. Immaculately shot, it’s a video full of beautiful imagery and poignant scenes, fitting to the downbeat yet tender music. Check it out below. (Video directed by Finn Keenan)
